faqs.question: How can I book a bus ticket?
faqs.answer: You can book tickets directly from the 'Book Ticket' page on the HR Roadways website. Simply select your source, destination, and travel date, then proceed with payment.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: We accept UPI, debit/credit cards, net banking, and popular wallets. Cash payment is only available at physical ticket counters.

faqs.question: How can I check bus timings?
faqs.answer: Go to the 'Bus Schedule' page and enter your source and destination to view available timings for the day.

faqs.question: Can I cancel or reschedule my ticket?
faqs.answer: Yes. Visit the 'Manage Booking' section, enter your booking ID, and follow the steps to cancel or reschedule as per the cancellation policy.

faqs.question: Do you offer student or senior citizen discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, HR Roadways provides discounted fares for students and senior citizens. Please carry a valid ID proof when traveling.

faqs.question: What happens if my bus is delayed?
faqs.answer: In case of delays, you will be notified via SMS or email. You can also check real-time status under 'Track Bus' on the website.

faqs.question: How can I contact HR Roadways customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach us at +91-1800-111-222 (toll-free) or email us at support@hrroadways.in.

faqs.question: Is there a luggage limit?
faqs.answer: Each passenger is allowed up to 20kg of luggage. For additional baggage, please contact the bus station staff.

faqs.question: Do buses have Wi-Fi and charging points?
faqs.answer: Most HR Roadways premium buses are equipped with free Wi-Fi and mobile charging points.
